docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 16 -- The Foreign Economic Administration's decentralization procedure so far as exports to Latin-American countries are concerned was modified considerably for thirteen additional countries today. The modifications are effective...
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, June 16 -- The Foreign Economic Administration's decentralization procedure so far as exports to Latin-American countries are concerned was modified considerably for thirteen additional countries today. The modifications are effective July 1, and notices were sent to all exporters today notifying them that after that date the decentralization procedure will be lifted except for a relatively few classes of commodities.

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, June 17 (AP) -An inter-American effort will be made to rescue 2,000 racial and political refugees from Germany and German-occupied territory before they are subjected to treatment which may annihilate the group.

docs.snippet: CAMP days are here again and Junior and his sister are packing their kits ready to take off July 1, when most children's camps open. In response to ODT requests some camps get under way earlier to relieve congestion on railroads at a peak season.

docs.snippet: The Canadian free dollar was easier last week, the first show of irregularity since early May when the dollar started its climb to a five-year high reached about mid-month. Not a great deal of business was involved on this setback which was due...
docs.lead_paragraph: The Canadian free dollar was easier last week, the first show of irregularity since early May when the dollar started its climb to a five-year high reached about mid-month. Not a great deal of business was involved on this setback which was due mainly to the falling off in the demand rather than to any pressure of sales.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 22 (Delayed) -- While an Argentine court was passing sentence of two years' imprisonment yesterday on four confessed German spies, it became known that the Buenos Aires police lately had arrested and questioned a great...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 22 (Delayed) -- While an Argentine court was passing sentence of two years' imprisonment yesterday on four confessed German spies, it became known that the Buenos Aires police lately had arrested and questioned a great number of United Nations' citizens.

headline.main: ARGENTINES DETAIN 30 ALLIED CITIZENS; Arrests Follow Sentencing of 4 German Spies -- Plan of 'Impartiality' Suspected

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 28 -- The recall of Norman Armour, United States Ambassador in Argentina, to Washington for consultation, threw the Argentine Government into such a state of agitation that its first reaction was to try to keep the news from...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 28 -- The recall of Norman Armour, United States Ambassador in Argentina, to Washington for consultation, threw the Argentine Government into such a state of agitation that its first reaction was to try to keep the news from the Argentine people and yesterday's evening newspapers were forbidden to make any mention of it.
docs.abstract: Argentine reaction; crisis sensed; Amb to US Escobar denies repts that he is returning home; Ger diplomats exch with Argentine diplomats in Ger planned

headline.main: SHIFT OF ARMOUR SHOCKS ARGENTINA; News of Envoy's Recall for Talks Was Banned at First -- Officials Sense a Crisis

byline.original: By Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 29 -- Ambassador Armour left Buenos Aires this morning by plane for Santiago, Chile, en route to Washington. Much comment was occasioned when the Chilean Ambassador, Senor Rios Gallardo, traveled to Santiago on the same...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, June 29 -- Ambassador Armour left Buenos Aires this morning by plane for Santiago, Chile, en route to Washington. Much comment was occasioned when the Chilean Ambassador, Senor Rios Gallardo, traveled to Santiago on the same plane.
